Experienced

Jo em rebel·lo started its technology development in 2007 by former Wind&Site engineers (with more than 20 years of experience), atmospheric physicists and computer experts in a unusual collaborative team of experienced professionals with active researchers.

Our products have been designed after intensive dialog with the wind industry and we benefit from a users continuous feedback.

Independent

Jo em rebel·lo is a private company, owned by its members and independent of any investment fund or consultancy firm. We have developed our own technology and do not depend on third parties to modify it.

Supported

At Jo em rebel·lo we are not alone: our technology is based on WRF, a state-of-the-art non-linear flow code developed through a collaborative effort by several atmospheric research centers and an active community.

Jo em rebel·lo is member of


AEE - Asociación Empresarial Eólica


EWEA - The European Wind Energy Association


AWEA - American Wuind Energy Association


European Wind Energy Technology Platform

Contact us

If you have any questions about what we do, who we are or how we can help you, please don't hesitate to contact us.
